faceChipsEmbeddingsVersion.description: The Paravision embeddings version to create when performing face chips processing. The set of allowed values is: {'5', '6'}

detectionTime.description: Time (RFC 3339) when activity and/or edge AI determined that further processing of these images should be carried out. In other words, the initial detection time.

location.description: Location of mobile camera when detection occurred (in GeoJSON Point format). If camera is configured with location, this will override that value.

analysisType.description: The type of analysis to perform on the chip images. Only one of the following properties should be defined, as only one analysis is carried out per request.

gunDetection.description: Indicates that gun detection should be performed. Consists of an object containing any analysis-specific options. There are no analysis-specific options for gun detection.

faceDetection.description: Indicates that face detection should be performed. Consists of an object containing any analysis-specific options. There are no analysis-specific options for face detection.

personAnalysis.description: Indicates that person analytics should be performed. Consists of an object containing any analysis-specific options. There are no analysis-specific options for person analysis.

vehicleAnalysis.description: Indicates that vehicle analytics should be performed. Consists of an object containing any analysis-specific options. The allowable option for vehicle chips is `chipsType`. `chipsType` may be set to `vehicles` or `plates`. If `chipsType` is not specified, `plates` is the default
